text: I’ve also had this problem but it’s never been solved. Would love to know if there’s a resolution :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey team! A Community user is looking to created a 'related blog posts listing' by following the tutorial and is having some trouble: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Listing-related-blog-post-articles/m-p/270479>. If anyone has any tips, tricks, suggestions or thoughts, it would be greatly appreciated! :slightly_smiling_face:
Want to eliminate mobile resizing on HubSpot landing pages.  The mobile view makes the header image really small? Help plssss
That is probably not the route you want to go. It would be better to fix the problem than to force your visitors to suffer through a non mobile optimized user experience
<@UGSHUDEAC> as Chad noted, that would be a really bad idea. It would be better to have a developer fix the responsive issues instead.
